# lop
## Generates a list of 6digit random numbers with prefix

1. geo@pc:~/Documents/lop$ ls
2. lop.rb
3. geo@pc:~/Documents/lop$ ruby lop.rb 
4. give prefix
5. 6977
6. how many do you want
7. 20
8. 6977405135
9. 6977334444
10. 6977514152
12. 6977320443
13. 6977522143
14. 6977441113
15. 6977424454

29. press enter to exit
